summary: Defines an end‑to‑end spoken language understanding model that processes raw audio to produce a token sequence while simultaneously predicting user intent and extracting slot values, leveraging byte‑pair encoding and configurable decoding strategies within the NeMo ASR framework.
business_intent: Enable voice‑driven applications such as virtual assistants, call‑center automation, and voice‑controlled services by providing accurate intent classification and slot extraction directly from speech.
